reasoning: Specific subtype of prostate cancer. SEER data (2005) showed metastatic prostate cancer incidence of 6.2-16.4 per 100,000 men varying by race (Non-Hispanic White vs Black). Estimate ~12 per 100,000 as global average accounting for racial variation and international differences.
source: SEER (Surveillance, Epidemiology, and End Results Program) registry
